hero.title: We don't just grow your business -
animatedPhrases: we remove the tech from your plate.
hero.description: Focus on what matters most — We build the tools and strategies to automate the rest.

aiCentered.title: We put AI at the center of {{everything}} we do.
aiCentered.subtitle: Your trusted partner in becoming an AI-first company.

aiJourney.header: Get a head start with our 3 step {{transformation}} journey

steps.label: Identify
steps.title: Identify
steps.subtitle: We help you identify high-impact AI opportunities and build a step-by-step AI Transformation strategy to bring them to life

steps.label: Educate
steps.title: Educate
steps.subtitle: We train and support your team with the right tools and know how to embed AI across all your entire organization

steps.label: Develop
steps.title: Develop
steps.subtitle: We leverage our extensive experience and network to develop custom AI systems that will increase your output 4 times

approach.title: Get A Head Start With AI
approach.description: We believe in working smarter not harder. Our approach focuses on personalization and integration of modern technologies.

speed.title: Speed and Efficiency
speed.description: Quick setup, from one week, for immediate impact on your practice.

personalization.title: Total Personalization
personalization.description: Tailored solutions adapted to your specific needs and practice.

whyWorkWithMe.title: Why I'm not like other agencies?
whyWorkWithMe.description: While traditional agencies charge for 120 hours of work that can be done in 20, I build AI systems that do the work while you focus on what actually matters. No more bureaucratic theater, no more inflated billing—just results that give you your freedom back.

cta.title: The future belongs to orchestrators
cta.description: The question isn't whether AI will transform your industry—it's whether you'll lead this transformation or get left behind.
